mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articles (article_title, article_content, writer_name, password, write_time, homepage , level, parent_id, write_ip) VALUES (#{articleTitle}, #{articleContent}, #{writerName}, SHA(#{password}), NOW() , #{homepage} , #{level}, #{parentId}, #{writeIp})
mapper.update: UPDATE articles SET mask = 1 WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
